originalText.text: I completed my 200-Hour Teacher Training with Shiva Shakti School of Yoga and it was one of the best life decisions I have made yet.  Shiva Shakti School of Yoga is authentic to the roots and history of Yoga, giving  students the chance to dig deeper into all limbs of yoga, not just the asana practice.  Once you meet the two beautiful souls that are behind Shiva Shakti, it makes sense why Shiva Shakti outshines all other yoga schools in the area.  Angela and Jan are genuine, knowledgeable, nurturing, kind, open, and encouraging- they make a great team.  They also bring in a variety of guest speakers who are very experienced in their fields and help to deepen and enrich the overall YTT experience.  Shiva Shakti School of Yoga is not just for people planning to teach, but for anyone who would like to deepen their own practice.  Jan and Angela have empowered me when it comes to my relationship with yoga.  Like yoga itself, this training is a journey of the self, and with Jan and Angela's teaching methods, the journey does not end after the 200 hours, it just begins.

originalText.text: One of the best life decisions I made was signing up and taking my YTT with Shiva Shakti. I not only got my 200-hr certification, but I also graduated with a life-long, growing family of supportive mentors, friends, sangha sisters, and a community that I know has my back; and walked out with a strong practice of self-discovery.

text.text: One of the best life decisions I made was signing up and taking my YTT with Shiva Shakti. I not only got my 200-hr certification, but I also graduated with a life-long, growing family of supportive mentors, friends, sangha sisters, and a community that I know has my back; and walked out with a strong practice of self-discovery.

originalText.text: If you are looking for an inclusive and immersive 200 hour teach training, look no further. This training gave me the opportunity to explore, expand, and feel confident in my abilities to teach. Angela and Jan have teaching styles that are balanced and compliment each other beautifully. I am so happy that I am able to be a part of this community.

text.text: If you are looking for an inclusive and immersive 200 hour teach training, look no further. This training gave me the opportunity to explore, expand, and feel confident in my abilities to teach. Angela and Jan have teaching styles that are balanced and compliment each other beautifully. I am so happy that I am able to be a part of this community.

originalText.text: I'm 53, have a coaching practice and didn't plan on becoming a yoga teacher. I signed up for Shiva Shakti School of Yoga, NYC because I wanted to go deeper into my own practice and that I did! This online training offered so much: connection, guest experts, support, variety, high standards of learning and everything I needed to confidently say, I'm ready to teach now! I'm so grateful to the co-founders, dear Ang & Jan, their assistants, and my wonderful sangha community. For me this was only possible online as I live in Canada. The beauty of it is, we all showed up for every single class - no traffic or parking hassles. Just opened up my laptop and began in the comfort of my own home.
